seo.title: The David Dias | Front-End Developer, podcaster & content creator
seo.description: Hey, I'm David Dias! Front-End Developer based in Toronto/Canada. I love talking about code, technology, expatriation and life.

hero.presentation: I'm a Front-End Developer, podcaster and content creator passionate about solving digital and human problems! I enjoy meeting new people, building communities and talking about tech, expatriation and the web.
